text: The Bullmastiff is a breed of dog. It started in 19th-century England. It is a mixture of a bulldog and a mastiff. It has a short tan, reddish-brown coat with black on the face and ears. == Appearance == It stands and weighs . Bullmastiffs were originally used to discourage poaching and are now also used by police and as guard dogs. == References == Category:Dog breeds originating in England Category:FCI breeds Category:Molossers
title: Bullmastiff
